post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Microsoft .NET Web Developer
About the Job
Whitecap is growing and is actively seeking a seasoned Programmer / Web Developer with a background of success and hands-on experience working in a Microsoft .NET environment. The successful candidate will work as part of Whitecap project teams on the design, development, documentation, and implementation of web based business applications for clients across a range of industries.

The position largely involves designing and developing custom web-based software using:


ASP.NET, Visual Studio, VB.NET, C#
HTML, CSS, JavaScript, DHTML, XML, AJAX, SOAP
Microsoft SQL Server
Microsoft Office SharePoint Server



Requirements:


Good interpersonal and communication skills, both written and oral
Ability to work well in a team environment
Solid technical knowledge and design/programming skills
Ability to work independently, solve problems and think creatively
Ability to deliver quality work in a timely manner
post.title: .NET Web Developer
